# Notionotes Genius Privacy Policy

Effective Date: January 14, 2023

This Privacy Policy describes how Notionotes Genius («we», «us», or «our»)
collects, uses, stores, and protects user information («user», «you», or
«your») in connection with our Notion interaction API hosted at
[](https://railway.app/)<https://railway.app>.

Information Collected:

  * **Authentication Data:** We collect your Notion authentication token to enable interaction with the Notion API.
* **Page and Block Information:** We collect identifiers of pages and content blocks that you provide for creating or modifying pages in Notion.
* **Request Data:** We collect technical information from HTTP/HTTPS requests, such as IP addresses, to ensure the security and proper functioning of our API.

The collected information, such as
NOTION_TOKEN and NOTION_PAGE_ID, is not permanently stored in any part of this
API.

We do not store your information longer than necessary to fulfill the purposes
for which it was collected.

If you use this API through the GPT [Notionotes
Genius](https://chat.openai.com/g/g-oa6LyCp1p-notionotes-genius) on ChatGPT,
your credentials are used for the period during which the conversation with
the GPT is active.

DISEÑADO POR MISTER CONTENIDOS**

Aviso de cookies

Para el correcto funcionamiento de **mistercontenidos.com** usamos cookies
propias (que son necesarias para que esta web funcione correctamente) y de
terceros (para analíticas, elaboración de perfiles y publicidad).
sharing:
We do not use your information for marketing purposes nor share it with third
parties without your explicit consent.
